sentence: And did we get it right that the RNCwith no debate or recorded votealso said in the resolution that Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger engaged in the persecution of ordinary citizens engaged in legitimate political discourse? simply by looking into the details of the deadly attempt to keep Donald Trump in power?
author: Philip Elliott
title: Why the RNC's Embrace of Trump and the January Sixers Will Backfire
